settings.title: Frequently Asked Question
settings.subtitle: Your Questions, Our Answers

settings.title: Placing and Order
Shipping
Returns and exchanges
Security and privacy
Sustainability
Where is my order?
settings.text: Shipping confirmation emails for orders will send out once shipments have been packed up and handed over to the shipping carrier. These emails will contain a tracking number which can be used to follow and track packages in real time.

settings.title: Will I be kept informed of the status of my order?
settings.text: As soon as your order and payment go through, we'll send you an order confirmation email. We'll also email you once your order ships (1-5 business days, depending on the selected shipping speed) with a shipping confirmation email with tracking details (applicable in most countries).

settings.title: What if my email is wrong on my order?
